price: Afei Yεbͻͻ awoͻ ntoatoasoͻ foforͻ wͻ wͻn akyi.
arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قَرۡنًا ءَاخَرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma anshanā min baʿdihim qarnan ākharīna
